name: project-management-tool
description: Full-stack project management tool with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:api
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:api: cd backend && npm install && npx prisma generate
scripts.vercel-build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:api
